tip.opentd.pea_shooter_card: Can only place around sun flower, shoot pea to attack skeleton
tip.opentd.pea_pult_card: Can only place on creeper, throw pea to attack creeper
tip.opentd.diamond_shooter_card: Cost 1 diamond to place, shoot pea to generate diamond block
tip.opentd.nut_flower_card: Place on grass block, attract enemy around, explode after death
tip.opentd.laser_flower_card: Place on grass block, shoot laser to attack
tip.opentd.wrong_block: Can not place on this block
tip.opentd.wrong_entity: Can not place on this entity
tip.opentd.entity_count: Around specific entity must between %s and %s
tip.opentd.require_inventory: Lack summon required items in inventory
